page.title: 12Local Farm products
page.content: {TYPES OF CROPS:}The main types of crops are Wheat, Barley, oil seed rape, beans and oats. Some areas are left for grasses. {Dairy Products:}All dairy farms have a cotract with the Milk marketing board. This means that the farm does not have to sell its own milk. The tests that are taken out are such as Lactose, Butterfat, Protien, and hygiene quality. Young calves are 0ften taken to market because some farms have A pedigree this means that if they have a herd of cows e.g. Fresians they have to maintain that herd and not keep any cross breeds or cows of other types. {Beef Cattle and Sheep}are kept on several farms in our area e.g. Holtwood farm.
